Description: Gold coin; pierced with one hole. (whole)
Arabic inscription in centre within a plain circle, circular legend, all within a plain circle. (obverse)
Arabic inscription in centre within a plain circle, circular legend, all within a plain circle. (reverse)
Bibliographic references: BMC Oriental 4 / The coinage of Egypt under the Fatimee Khaleefehs, the Ayyoobees and the Memlook Sultans, classes XIVa, XV, XVI (120, p.31)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2016, 28 Apr-14 Aug, BM, G35 Sicily
